DataElement.preferredName: Prior Investigational Therapeutic Procedure Adverse Event Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to prior experimental therapeutic agents and outcomes of adverse events as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Investigational Therapeutic Procedure Adverse Event Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._In the process of being studied; experimental._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s)._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:In the process of being studied; experimental.  (NCI):An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: In the process of being studied; experimental.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Adverse Event Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has received prior
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior experimental (non-FDA approved) therapies and immunotherapies, patients has not have received these therapies for 4 weeks prior to the initiation of study treatment (or within five half-lives of the investigational product, whichever is longer) and has recovered to less than or equal to Grade 1 from any adverse events of these therapies (other than alopecia)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been off prior therapy with any investigational agent administered as part of a Phase 0 study (also referred to as an "early Phase I study" or "pre-Phase I study" where a sub-therapeutic dose of drug is administered) at the Coordinating Center PI's discretion less than 2 weeks and failed to recover to eligibility levels from any toxicities?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior experimental (non-FDA approved) therapies and immunotherapies, patients has not received these therapies for 4 weeks prior to the initiation of study treatment and has fully recovered from any acute effects of these therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have greater than or equal to 2 weeks elapsed since administration of a study drug in a phase 0 or equivalent study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 2 weeks since any investigational agent administered as part of a Phase 0 study (where a sub-therapeutic dose of drug is administered) at the PI's discretion, and has recovered to grade 1 or baseline from any toxicities?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was last treatment with any investigational agent administered as part of a Phase 0 study (also referred to as an early Phase I study or pre-Phase I study where a sub-therapeutic dose of drug is administered) greater than or equal to 2 weeks,  at the Coordinating Center PIs discretion, and should have recovered to eligibility levels from any toxicities?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior experimental (non-FDA approved) therapies and immunotherapies, patient has not received these therapies for 4 weeks prior to the initiation of study treatment and has recovered to less than or equal to Grade 1 from any adverse events of these therapies (other than alopecia)?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 8/4/2022: fixed the box symbol in AQT_wz
